title: Why did the City of Wilmington name the 17th Street roadway south of Shipyard Blvd. \17th Street EXTENSION?\"  That seems to reflect Powell Bill days which granted money for extension of municipal roadways. Also \"17th\" Street does not line up with numbering system of its cross streets such as South College Road.  "
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Thanks for using MyReporter.com!  http://www.myreporter.com/?p=10834
